oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A ceremony performed with the Brachycerus (African Ground Weevil) in order to preserve young babies from convulsions. In the Katkop dialect by Dia!kwain (L V.-23. 5833-5840) The Brachycerus used to cure illness in little children. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-21. 7822-7825). !nu !nurussi Brachycerus,
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Brachycerus The used as a means of cure for little children; the same insect not used again when another child is ill
